description: This Java class defines the LegacyGodparentInfoMessageEvent, a subclass of LegacyApsAckedCommandEvent, which constructs and provides a payload for a specific Zigbee event related to legacy godparent info messages.

classes.name: LegacyGodparentInfoMessageEvent
classes.description: Represents a ZigbeeLegacy event for godparent information messages, capable of generating a specific command payload.

methods.name: LegacyGodparentInfoMessageEvent
methods.description: Constructor initializing the event with device and message-specific parameters.

methods.name: getCommandPayload
methods.description: Generates and returns the command payload as a byte array in the specified format.
